original_title: Engelbert Humperdinck: Live at the Royal Albert Hall
overview: In this memorable concert filmed at London's Royal Albert Hall in 1985, pop music legend Engelbert Humperdinck joins the London Philharmonic Orchestra to perform many of his hits. Songs include "Please Release Me," "After the Loving," "Lonely Is a Man Without Love" and "I Just Called To Say I Love You."
title: Engelbert Humperdinck: Live at the Royal Albert Hall
